title: Game Mode: Definitely Not Summoners Rift
body:
So I was thinking it would be so cool if riot made a game mode in which you were definitely not the champion you played... Picture this... You get in champ select now you click on {{champion:101}} but wait theres more you can click on another champion so you pick {{champion:11}} the game starts you load in as {{champion:101}} but when you get in game you have {{champion:11}}  abilities no one knows accept your team... "oh look im laning  against  {{champion:201}}.... Oh wait WHAT THE *&%#@ He JUST {{champion:99}} SNIPED ME?!!?!?!".... I dont know i just feel like it would be really fun... PLZ Riot? 

                                                                                                                                                                      Very Truly Yours: The Tomoki Tower
